Name: Dinesh Gundu Rao
Tweet: 7km padayatra in KR Pura constituency and a massive public meeting. #NammaBengaluruNammaHemme off to a fantastic start, as we kick start the program, will cover all the 28 assemblies in #Bengaluru.
